TopicTitle: How to Build Space Station in demo

Articles.Content: hi im a demo user and i need help i need to make a space station in demo but im having probs getting it into space anyone have ideas or can send me there DEMO space station as a .craft file so i can use it for my build ill say when done when ive found a working idea! -Thanks Zizzlethekerbal Aka Zizzle8383

With the limited selection of parts available in the demo, you're going to have huge troubles pulling off something like that.

I mean, I'm not even sure the demo includes a docking port... and building single monolithic launchers is also much more difficult than in the full game. What you are looking to do here may not be possible.

3 hours ago, ZizzleTheKerbal said:

hi im a demo user and i need help i need to make a space station in demo but im having probs getting it into space anyone have ideas or can send me there DEMO space station as a .craft file so i can use it for my build ill say when done when ive found a working idea! -Thanks Zizzlethekerbal Aka Zizzle8383

Ok, I'm building one now anyway, {In the DEMO} I'll put the link here when I'm finished.

How to create a space station in demo:

  1. Launch something into orbit
  2. Leave it there
  3. Call it a station

Otherwise the question has to be ... what do you want this station to do?
